# edgio_property (Resource)

Use the `edgio_property` resource to:
* Create a new property.
* Update an existing property.
* Delete a property.

## Schema

### Required

- `organization_id` (String)
- `slug` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `id_link` (String)
- `updated_at` (String)
